de.bitbrain.braingdx.world

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.world.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<GameObject>

    public class GameWorld
extends Object
implements Iterable<GameObject>
    Game world which contains all game objects and managed them.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
